body_content.explanation: the value of a company, divided into many equal parts owned by the shareholders, or one of the equal parts into which the value of a company is divided:
examples: He sold his equity in the company last year.
The rights give holders the opportunity to purchase additional equity interests in the company at a big discount.

body_content.explanation: the value of a property after you have paid any mortgage or other charges relating to it
the situation in which everyone is treated fairly according to their needs and no group of people is given special treatment:
examples: a society based on equity and social justice

body_content.explanation: in English-speaking countries, a system of justice that allows a fair judgment of a case where the laws that already exist are not satisfactory
